an5.257-263:1.1: “Mendicants, without giving up these five qualities you can’t enter and remain in the second absorption … third absorption … fourth absorption … or realize the fruit of stream-entry … the fruit of once-return … the fruit of non-return … perfection.
an5.257-263:1.3: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teachings.
an5.257-263:1.4: Without giving up these five qualities you can’t realize perfection.
an5.257-263:2.1: But after giving up these five qualities you can enter and remain in the second absorption … third absorption … fourth absorption … and realize the fruit of stream-entry … the fruit of once-return … the fruit of non-return … perfection.
an5.257-263:2.3: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and the teachings.
an5.257-263:2.4: After giving up these five qualities you can realize perfection.”
